title: Available Today! 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Take A Tour!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Welcome to “Just Right” Living™ in the heart of the Puget Sound!', 'Village Fair Apartments is a quaint garden-style community tucked away in the town of Bremerton, WA on the Kitsap Peninsula – just west of Seattle.', 'A place where nature & urban living come together.', 'With all the charm of the Pacific Northwest & easy access to downtown Bremerton, this is “Just Right” Living™ within reach!', 'Our floor plans are designed with you in mind.', 'With a variety of spacious 1, 2, and 3-bedroom options, you will find the home that’s “just right” for you.', 'Each apartment at Village Fair has modern interior upgrades, and our sprawling, lush green landscape offers a plethora of luxury community features.', 'Make yourself at home with all these cozy amenities & enjoy living in a beautiful community managed by people who care.', 'That’s what “Just Right” Living™ is all about!', 'Village Fair offers the very best of Pacific Northwest living on the Kitsap Peninsula.', 'Fairgrounds Road right near the intersection of Johanson’s Corner gives you easy access to nearby restaurants, while also keeping you close to shopping destinations & all that Silverdale has to offer.', 'With the Bremerton Ferry, you can get to Seattle in 60 minutes – or 30 minutes, if you take the high-speed “fast ferry.”', 'Convenient commuter options are also available via SR 303 and SR 3 highways.', 'Naval Base Kitsap-Bremerton is 6 miles south of the property & Naval Base Kitsap-Bangor is 9 miles to the northwest.', 'Village Fair gives you access to everything that makes the Puget Sound a great place to live!', "Nestled in Bremerton, WA, with the perfect combination of natural light & beautiful fir trees, Village Fair offers the “just right” lifestyle you've always dreamed of having & can now afford, in a community managed by people who care.", 'Contact us today to schedule a tour of your new home.', 'We look forward to hearing from you!', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'Today', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'No aggressive breeds allowed.$50 Pet Rent/Month/Dog$35 Pet Rent/Month/Cat$250
